START.name: at the gates of a grand city
START.desc:
The entrance is guarded by two giant soldiers.
There is a large, seemingly endless, forest behind you.

WALL.name: at the wall surrounding the city
WALL.desc:
There are many wanderers and shading looking figures patroling around the area,
it may be better to return back to the gate since you have no weapons.

CITY.name: in the grand city of Mibaku! Welcome!
CITY.desc: You enter the city walls into a crowded courtyard, surrounded by villagers and travelers.

PUB.name: at local pub, down the street from the city entrance.
PUB.desc: You fight your way into the bar, and manage to make your way up to the bartender.

SHADY.name: in the pub having a drink. A shady, cloaked, figure approaches you.
SHADY.desc: In your vulnerable state, the cloaked stranger stabs you and steals your belongings

SHADY2.name: in the shop, a man approaches you.
SHADY2.desc: He asks if you's be interested in seeing some items he has for sale outsidethe shop.

SHADY3.name: in an alley way, the man displays various weapons he says are for sale.
SHADY3.desc: Noticing you have no weapon, he draws his sword out and attacks you, in attempt to stal your belongings.

MARKET.name: entering a giant marketplace, shops as far as the eye can see!
MARKET.desc: You wander the many rows of shops, taking in the unlimited relics and goods for sale. To bad you have no money...

FOREST.name: a dark forest surrounding the city walls.
FOREST.desc: The forest seems to be unpassable, but in the distance you hear a distant voice, it beckons to you.

ATTACKED.name: much deeper in the forest. The visibility is next to none.
ATTACKED.desc:
You begin to hear footsteps somewhere near you. You turn toward the noise, but just as an arrow immediately pierces through your throat.
Your body crumples to the ground.

WSHOP.name: in a weapong shop, slightly off the beaten path of the city mainways. There are many interesting characters shopping as well.
WSHOP.desc: The store owner suggests he show you some of his best items.

SALE.name: in the back room of the weapons shop, looking over the wares of the store owner.
SALE.desc: He discovers you have no money, and in an effort to be nice, offers you a free dagger because he believes you are a kind soul.

EAT.name: at a table in the bar. The bartender brings you a plate of the daily food special
EAT.desc:
The foods looks like nothing you have seen before.
It appears similar to a familiar animal, yet it seems to have about a dozen eyeballs.
You dig in!

BROOM.name: in the bathroom. Your stomach is in turmoil, and you begin to vommit uncontrollably.
BROOM.desc: You vanquish your insides and flop on the floor, the animal you ate appears to be sending you into an allergic reaction.

FOUNTAIN.name: in the courtyard of a giant fountain. There are people everywhere around it.
FOUNTAIN.desc: You notice a woman in the near distance, beckoning you over to her location.

GIRL.name: in front of a beautiful woman. Her attractiveness infatuates you.
GIRL.desc:
You lock eyes with her, and she begins to lean in for a kiss.
The two of you kiss, and you are consumed in a moment of euphoria, yet when you pull away, you soon feel a shortness of breath.
You drop to the floor, poisoned by an elixer on her lips. She searches through your belongings as you lay motionless.

DEAD.name:
DEAD.
A gentle warm feeling takes over your body, and the darkness consumes your mind as you drift off into oblivion...

WIN.name:
finally not defenseless in the city of Mibaku!
Now you can adventure out and attempt to defend yourself against all types of dangers in the world!
